page.title: 13Amenities
page.content: COMMUNICATION:There are no Post Offices in the area,but there are several nearby(Colesbourne,Rendcombe,Chedworth) There is a regular collection & delivery.A bus service runs from Cheltenham to Cirencester on the A435 every 2 hours from 1015 to 1815.The cost is 105p single &158p return. A landscape of thin settlement with a total population less than 150,it has few amenities.There are no villages in this area & only 3 (Rendcombe Chedworth Colesbourne)that lie nearby.Tourism is important as it is an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty,but there are no special attractions such as a stately home.There is no entertainment in the area. For theatre,cinema,hospital or shopping they go to a town such as Cheltenham & to nearby villages for the Post Office,doctors etc.
